attributes.action: Have police presence outside all McDonalds in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At night and on weekend daytimes, the meeting place for unruly teenagers across the UK appears to be outside McDonalds. Often this is the troublesome group of kids. Let's petition to have measures taken to keep them away from this area.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
